data.message: Its amazing how rude people can be... and its sad. He's grown up, therefore his music has evolved.  Why are yall even on his fan page if the only thing you can say is negative comments? Funny how yall sit in your mommy living room and talk trash about some one who has been man of year more times than people even know, he has changed rap, broken  racist holds that one color is allowed to do this or that,  he is one of the very very few who gives back to his community,  childrens organizations, amongst many other things.... and almost died, and when he got clean and found out the hard way what should be important-and makes those changes his so called "fans" bash him. Kinda glad yall arent his friends.... with friends like yall who needs enemies.  Grow up, get a job and stop hating.

replies.message: Angel Derden   <3    that's all I gotta say!!!!!!!!! Nice, you nailed it!!!!!!!!!!  ;)
